item.name: Node 1 Average Drives I/O Operations, IOPS
item.description: The average amount of I/O operations transferred per second for read and write operations to drives during the sample period.

item.name: Node 2 Average Drives I/O Operations, IOPS
item.description: The average amount of I/O operations transferred per second for read and write operations to drives during the sample period.

item.name: Node 1 Average Drives I/O Operations, MBps
item.description: The average number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for read and write operations to drives during the sample period.

item.name: Node 2 Average Drives I/O Operations, MBps
item.description: The average number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for read and write operations to drives during the sample period.

item.name: Node 1 Average Drives I/O Operations Latency
item.description: The average amount of time in milliseconds that the system takes to respond to read and write requests to drives over the sample period.

item.name: Node 2 Average Drives I/O Operations Latency
item.description: The average amount of time in milliseconds that the system takes to respond to read and write requests to drives over the sample period.

item.name: Node 1 FC Traffic, IOPS
item.description: Displays the total input/output (I/O) operations transferred per seconds for Fibre Channel traffic on the system. This value includes host I/O and any bandwidth that is used for communication within the system.

item.name: Node 2 FC Traffic, IOPS
item.description: Displays the total input/output (I/O) operations transferred per seconds for Fibre Channel traffic on the system. This value includes host I/O and any bandwidth that is used for communication within the system.

item.name: Node 1 FC Traffic, MBps
item.description: The total number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for Fibre Channel traffic on the system. This value includes host I/O and any bandwidth that is used for communication within the system.

item.name: Node 2 FC Traffic, MBps
item.description: The total number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for Fibre Channel traffic on the system. This value includes host I/O and any bandwidth that is used for communication within the system.

item.name: Node 1 IP Partnership Traffic, IOPS
item.description: The total input/output (I/O) operations transferred per second for IP partnership traffic on the system. This value does not include Internet Small Computer System Interface (iSCSI) host I/O operations.

item.name: Node 2 IP Partnership Traffic, IOPS
item.description: The total input/output (I/O) operations transferred per second for IP partnership traffic on the system. This value does not include Internet Small Computer System Interface (iSCSI) host I/O operations.

item.name: Node 1 IP Replication Traffic, MBps
item.description: The total number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for Internet Protocol (IP) replication traffic on the system. This value does not include iSCSI host input/output (I/O) operations.

item.name: Node 2 IP Replication Traffic, MBps
item.description: The total number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for Internet Protocol (IP) replication traffic on the system. This value does not include iSCSI host input/output (I/O) operations.

item.name: Node 1 iSCSI Traffic, IOPS
item.description: The total I/O operations transferred per second for iSCSI traffic on the system.

item.name: Node 2 iSCSI Traffic, IOPS
item.description: The total I/O operations transferred per second for iSCSI traffic on the system.

item.description: The total number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for iSCSI traffic on the system.

item.name: Node 2 iSCSI Traffic, MBps
item.description: The total number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for iSCSI traffic on the system.

item.name: Node 1 SAS Traffic, IOPS
item.description: The total I/O operations transferred per second for SAS traffic on the system. This value includes host I/O and bandwidth that is used for background RAID activity.

item.name: Node 2 SAS Traffic, IOPS
item.description: The total I/O operations transferred per second for SAS traffic on the system. This value includes host I/O and bandwidth that is used for background RAID activity.

item.name: Node 1 SAS Traffic, MBps
item.description: The total number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for serial-attached SCSI (SAS) traffic on the system. This value includes host I/O and bandwidth that is used for background RAID activity.

item.name: Node 2 SAS Traffic, MBps
item.description: The total number of megabytes transferred per second (MBps) for serial-attached SCSI (SAS) traffic on the system. This value includes host I/O and bandwidth that is used for background RAID activity.
